channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-31929] local cache size exceeding "spark.history.store.maxDiskUsage" triggered "java.io.IOException" in history server on Windows
item.description:
HTTP ERROR 500

Problem accessing /history/app-20190711215551-0001/stages/. Reason:

Server Error
